bibl.title: Linguistic Varieties and Language Level in Latin Non-Literary Letters.
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. A Letter of recommendation: C.E.L. 169 = P. Oxy. I, 32 + II, pp. 318-319. - 3. The earliest latin letters on papyrus. - 4. Some related cases from Vindolanda. - 5. Conclusion.
HALLA-AHO Hilla, Linguistic Varieties and Language Level in Latin Non-Literary Letters.
Trevor V. EVANS and Dirk D. OBBINK (Edd.), The Language of the Papyri (Oxford, 2010) pp. 171-183.
